fees.description: Total sum of fees forged by delegate

rewards.description: Total sum of rewards made by delegate

delegates.description: Array of next forgers public keys
List of delegates account voted for.

broadhash.description: Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database

epoch.description: Time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.

fee.description: Current fee value for `type 0` (token transfer) transactions. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

nethash.description: The `nethash` describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.

milestone.description: Current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.

reward.description: The reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Depends on the slot height.

supply.description: Total current supply of ADM tokens in the network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Total supply increases with every new forged block.

PublicKey.description: 256 bit public key of ADAMANT address in hex format

amount.description: Amount to transfer, 8 decimal points (100000000 equals to 1 ADM). For non-transfer transactions must be `0`

type.description: Type of chat message (1 - Basic Encrypted Message, 2 - Rich Content Message, 3 - Signal Message). See details https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Message-Types

rate.description: Current position in the Delegates List

rank.description: Current position in the Delegates List

approval.description: Share of votes of all votes in the system

productivity.description: Productivity / Uptime of a delegate. If `0`, delegate is not active now

receivedAt.description: Date and time in ISO 8601 format

voters_cnt.description: Number of accounts who voted for delegate

register_timestamp.description: Epoch timestamp of when delegate was registered

username.description: Voter's delegate username. `null` if address is not a delegate.

balance.description: ADM balance of voter's ADAMANT wallet. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000)

items.description: Delegate public key. Leave as is for Upvote or prefix the public key with minus sign (`-`) for Downvote

recipientId.description: ADAMANT address of account who votes. Same as `senderId`

senderId.description: ADAMANT address of account who votes. Same as `recipientId`

port.description: Port number of ADAMANT node. `36666` for mainnet or `36667` for testnet

state.description: State of the peer. Available values: Connected (2), Disconnected, Banned

broadhash.description: Broadhash on the peer node. Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database.

updated.description: Unix timestamp based in ms, when peer updated

nonce.description: Unique Identifier for the peer. Random string.

delegate.description: Registration of a new delegate, type 2

old_chat_message.description: Sending a message (not used for now)

broadhash.description: Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database

epoch.description: Time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.

milestone.description: Current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.

nethash.description: The `nethash` describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.

reward.description: The reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

supply.description: Total current supply of ADM tokens in the network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

recipientId.description: There is no recipient for this type of transaction

recipientPublicKey.description: There is no recipient for this type of transaction

type.description: Should be always equal to `9` (Store in KVS transaction type)

recipientId.description: There is no recipient for this type of transaction

recipientPublicKey.description: There is no recipient for this type of transaction

type.description: Can be `type 0  Token transfer` or `type 8  Chat/Message`.

userId.name: userId
userId.description:
Filter by senderId/recipientId.
The query will look like `tx.senderId = {userId} OR tx.recipientId = {userId}`.

andUserId.name: and:userId
andUserId.description:
Filter by senderId/recipientId (`and` operator).
The query will look like `tx.senderId = {userId} OR tx.recipientId = {userId}`.

orUserId.name: or:userId
orUserId.description:
Filter by senderId/recipientId (`or` operator).
The query will look like `tx.senderId = {userId} OR tx.recipientId = {userId}`.

withoutDirectTransfers.name: withoutDirectTransfers
withoutDirectTransfers.description: When set to `true`, excludes type `0` transactions (direct token transfers) from results. Default is `false`.

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Limit number of transactions in the result

andFromHeight.name: and:fromHeight
andFromHeight.description: Filter starting from specific height (`and` operator)

orFromHeight.name: or:fromHeight
orFromHeight.description: Filter starting from specific height (`or` operator)

toHeight.name: toHeight
toHeight.description: Filter results till block with specific height

andToHeight.name: and:toHeight
andToHeight.description: Filter results till block with specific height (`and` operator)

orToHeight.name: or:toHeight
orToHeight.description: Filter results till block with specific height (`or` operator)

andInId.name: and:inId
andInId.description: Filter by recipientId/senderId `("recipientId" = ${inId} OR "senderId" = ${inId})` with `and` operator

orInId.name: or:inId
orInId.description: Filter by recipientId/senderId `("recipientId" = ${inId} OR "senderId" = ${inId})` with `or` operator

type.name: type
type.description:
Get messages of specified type. See [Message Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Message-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

andType.name: and:type
andType.description:
Get messages of specified type. See [Message Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Message-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

orType.name: or:type
orType.description:
Get messages of specified type. See [Message Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Message-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

limit-2.name: limit
limit-2.description: Limit number of transactions in the result

senderIds.name: senderIds
senderIds.description: Filter by list of senders. Separated by comma

andSenderIds.name: and:senderIds
andSenderIds.description: Filter by list of senders (`and` operator). Separated by comma

orSenderIds.name: or:senderIds
orSenderIds.description: Filter by list of senders (`or` operator). Separated by comma

schema.description: Get transactions of specified KVS key
Get transactions of specified KVS keys. Array of keys, comma-separated.

type-2.name: type
type-2.description:
When sending KVS transaction, type field of state object must be as follows:

- `0` for full re-writing of contents by specified key value
- `1` for incremental appending contents

For more details see [AIP 11: Behavior for KVS data](https://aips.adamant.im/AIPS/aip-11)

recipientIds.name: recipientIds
recipientIds.description: Filter by list of recipients. Separated by comma

andRecipientIds.name: and:recipientIds
andRecipientIds.description: Filter by list of recipients (`and` operator). Separated by comma

orRecipientIds.name: or:recipientIds
orRecipientIds.description: Filter by list of recipients (`or` operator). Separated by comma

senderPublicKeys.name: senderPublicKeys
senderPublicKeys.description: Filter by sender publicKeys. Separated by comma

andSenderPublicKeys.name: and:senderPublicKeys
andSenderPublicKeys.description: Filter by sender publicKeys (`and` operator). Separated by comma

orSenderPublicKeys.name: or:senderPublicKeys
orSenderPublicKeys.description: Filter by sender publicKeys (`or` operator). Separated by comma

recipientPublicKeys.name: recipientPublicKeys
recipientPublicKeys.description: Filter by recipient publicKeys. Separated by comma

andRecipientPublicKeys.name: and:recipientPublicKeys
andRecipientPublicKeys.description: Filter by recipient publicKeys (`and` operator). Separated by comma

orRecipientPublicKeys.name: or:recipientPublicKeys
orRecipientPublicKeys.description: Filter by recipient publicKeys (`or` operator). Separated by comma

minAmount.name: minAmount
minAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not less than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

andMinAmount.name: and:minAmount
andMinAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not less than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

orMinAmount.name: or:minAmount
orMinAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not less than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

maxAmount.name: maxAmount
maxAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not more than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

andMaxAmount.name: and:maxAmount
andMaxAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not more than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

orMaxAmount.name: or:maxAmount
orMaxAmount.description: Filter results with `amount` not more than specified Integer value of 1/10^8 tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).

type-3.name: type
type-3.description:
Get transactions of specified type. See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

andType-2.name: and:type
andType-2.description:
Get transactions of specified type. See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

orType-2.name: or:type
orType-2.description:
Get transactions of specified type. See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).
If `type` is not set, all types of transactions will be returned.

types.name: types
types.description:
Get transactions of specified list of types, separated by commas.
See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).

andTypes.name: and:types
andTypes.description:
Get transactions of specified list of types, separated by commas.
See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).

orTypes.name: or:types
orTypes.description:
Get transactions of specified list of types, separated by commas.
See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types).

returnAsset.name: returnAsset
returnAsset.description: Get transaction's asset when set to `1`. Default is `0`.

tags.name: Account

tags.description: List of endpoints giving information of blocks in ADAMANT blockchain

tags.name: Chats
tags.description: List of endpoints intended to work with chats and chatrooms in ADAMANT blockchain

tags.description: Endpoints useful in working with delegate system of ADAMANT blockchain

tags.name: Nodes and Blockchain
tags.description: List of endpoints useful in work with ADAMANT blockchain in general

tags.name: KVS

tags.name: Transactions

get.description: Get account information by ADAMANT address or by Public Key
Get account balance
Get account Public Key
Get block information by ID
Get list of blocks

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: How much blocks to get, integer. Default is `100`.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

parameters.name: generatorPublicKey
parameters.description: Delegate's public key of ADAMANT address who generated the block

parameters.name: height
parameters.description: Get block of specific node's height

Get messages between two accounts

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Height offset value for results. Default is `0`.

Search delegates by `username`

Returns information of the node sync process with other peers
Get ping status
Returns node software information
Broadhash is established as an aggregated rolling hash of the past five blocks present in the database.
Returns time when blockchain epoch starts. Value `2017-09-02T17:00:00.000Z` is for mainnet.
Returns current node's blockchain height
Returns current fee value for `type 0` (token transfer) transactions. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000).
Returns current fee values for different transaction types
The nethash describes e.g. the Mainnet or the Testnet, that the node is connecting to.
Return current slot height, which determines reward a delegate will get for forging a block.
Returns reward  the reward a delegate will get for forging a block. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Depends on the slot height.
Returns total current supply of ADM tokens in network. Integer amount of 1/10^8 ADM tokens (1 ADM = 100000000). Total supply increases with every new forged block.
Returns blockchain network information in a single request
Returns both ADAMANT blockchain network information and Node information in a single request.
Fetch data from KVS. As a result you'll get a list of transactions of `type = 9` with KVS data, stored in `asset.state` field.

Returns list of transactions

You can filter by single parameter, or by multiple parameters using logical operator `and` or `or`.
For more details check [Transactions Query Language](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transactions-Query-Language)

The params `blockId` act by default as `or` operator.

Get queued transactions

Get unconfirmed transactions

post.description: Broadcast transactions of `type 0  Token transfer` or `type 8  Chat/Message`. See [Transaction Types](https://github.com/Adamant-im/adamant/wiki/Transaction-Types)
